name: Onboarding started but not completed
description: Remind users to finish onboarding if they start but don’t complete setup. Use this workflow to catch users who start onboarding but drop off, and send them a timely reminder to finish setting up your product – without bothering users who already completed onboarding.

actions.name: Onboarding incomplete?
actions.description: Check whether the user has NOT completed onboarding.

actions.name: Reminder 1
actions.description: Send an onboarding reminder to the user.

value.html:
Send an email reminding the user to finish onboarding.

Typical content includes:

  • what’s left to do
  • why completing onboarding matters
  • a clear call-to-action to return to the product
value.text:

* what’s left to do

value.subject: Reminder to complete your onboarding

actions.name: Completed?
actions.description: Check whether the user completed onboarding

actions.name: Reminder 2
actions.description: Send an email to the user.

value.html:
Hi there,

 

Noticed you started setting things up but didn’t quite finish.

 

Once onboarding is complete, you’ll be able to get the most out of the product – from day one. If you got stuck or got distracted, no worries. It only takes a minute to pick up where you left off.
Continue setup

If something’s blocking you, or you’re not sure what to do next, this is a good time to jump back in or reach out for help.

 

See you inside,
The team

value.subject: Still setting things up?
value.preheader: You’re just one step away from getting value.

actions.name: Exit
actions.description: User moved through the campaign without errors.
